mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userId, userPw, userName, nickName, phone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{phone})

mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userPw = #{userPw}, userName = #{userName}, nickName = #{nickName}, phone = #{phone}, profileImage = #{profileImage} WHERE userId = #{userId} AND deleteDate IS NULL;
